channel.title: Need some help editing NPC texts
channel.description:
I go under the NpcHandeler.java file and edit the npcs to say what i want, note the server is down at the time i do it. And i save the file when closing. Bring up the server and BAM the npcs still have their old texts, does anyone know how to fix this problem?
I am using funscap3's source so i need the NPCs to say my name instead...
All help is appreciated soooo much.

item.title: Need some help editing NPC texts
item.dc:creator: @maul_alert maul alert
item.description:
@maul_alert wrote:

npc handler and search what the npc says…

or in dialogus or w/e

|…|
|…| Put this on your
|…| profile if you have
|…O| ever pushed a
|…| door that said pull
|…|

Read full topic
